div.div: Loras College vs. Buena Vista Univ.
at Storm Lake, Iowa | J. Leslie Rollins

tr.td: Loras won and deferred. BVU recieves.
Tyler Wilker kickoff 64 yards to the BVU06, Collin Mann return 17 yards to the BVU23 (Mike Canevello).
Buena Vista Univ. drive start at 15:00.
John Hill rush for 6 yards to the BVU29 (Zach Myers; Eric Meyer).
